Change Log
==========

3.2.0 (2023-01-27)
------------------

- Improved MARK/CONNMARK target support
- Reworked documentation

3.1.0 (2023-01-21)
------------------

- Added support for the TTL target
- Added support for the TTL match

3.0.1 (2022-12-31)
------------------

- First published release
